name: Oddly Adventure
description:
Oddly Adventure is a mini adventure game based on walking, running, jumping, grabbing, and throwing an Orb-Ball.

The Story is in the theme ' Undefined Imagination' which means you have to imagine the story from your perspective.

Game Features:
  • Total of 15 Courses to play.
  • Obstacles and Odd Aliens.
  • Interesting Mini Story. 
  • Fun world environment.
  • The gameplay feels amazing.
  • Flate Paint Graphics.
  • Retro ' 3 input ' control system.
  • Customizable & Flexible control layout.
  • Optimized Gameplay.

Main Objective of The Game:

Take the Orb-Ball all the way to the Basket and portal yourself to the next course for fun.
